name: cbvoprab3v
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, wff w0, wff w1
body: |- wceq(coprab(s0, s1, s2, w0), coprab(s0, s1, s3, w1))

stmt.origin: cbvoprab3(s0, s1, s2, s3, w0, w1)
stmt.pretty: cbvoprab3(s0, s1, s2, s3, w0, w1)

body.origin:
|- wceq(coprab(s0, s1, s2, w0), coprab(s0, s1, s3, w1))
-| wnf(s3, w0)
-| wnf(s2, w1)
-| wi(wceq(cv(s2), cv(s3)), wb(w0, w1))
-| diffss(s0, s2)
-| diffss(s0, s3)
-| diffss(s1, s2)
-| diffss(s1, s3)
-| diffss(s2, s3)

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(coprab(s0, s1, s2, w0), coprab(s0, s1, s3, w1))
-| wnf(s3, w0)
-| wnf(s2, w1)
-| wi(wceq(cv(s2), cv(s3)), wb(w0, w1))
-| diffss(s0, s2)
-| diffss(s0, s3)
-| diffss(s1, s2)
-| diffss(s1, s3)
-| diffss(s2, s3)

|- wceq(coprab(s0, s1, s2, w0), coprab(s0, s1, s3, w1))
-| wnf(s2, w1)
-| wi(wceq(cv(s2), cv(s3)), wb(w0, w1))
-| diffss(s0, s2)
-| diffss(s0, s3)
-| diffss(s1, s2)
-| diffss(s1, s3)
-| diffss(s2, s3)
-| diffsw(s3, w0)

|- wceq(coprab(s0, s1, s2, w0), coprab(s0, s1, s3, w1))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s2), cv(s3)), wb(w0, w1))
-| diffss(s0, s2)
-| diffss(s0, s3)
-| diffss(s1, s2)
-| diffss(s1, s3)
-| diffss(s2, s3)
-| diffsw(s3, w0)
-| diffsw(s2, w1)

comment: Rule used to change the third bound variable in an operation abstraction, using implicit substitution. (Contributed by NM, 8-Oct-2004.) (Revised by David Abernethy, 19-Jun-2012.)
